message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. You can do better in the next round, I'm sure.
I propose a different split. How about I take 450,000 and you receive 550,000? This offers a more balanced distribution compared to the previous offers.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I'll take 70% of the remaining amount, leaving you with 30%. Let's finalize the deal!
